name: @jsonic/args
description: This plugin allows the [Jsonic](https://jsonic.senecajs.org) JSON parser to parse REPL and command line arguments.
author: Richard Rodger (http://richardrodger.com)

scripts.build: tsc -d && cp args.js args.min.js && browserify -o args.min.js -e args.js -s @JsonicArgs -im -i assert -p tinyify
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm i && npm run build && npm test
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags;
scripts.repo-publish: npm run clean && npm i && npm run repo-publish-quick
scripts.repo-publish-quick: npm run prettier && npm run build && npm run test && npm run doc && npm run repo-tag && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org
